lyrics:

i breathe in slow to compose myself
but the bleeding heart i left on the shelf
started speeding now beating half to death
cause youre here and youre all mine

and i stay there and i reconnect
bravery ive been trying to perfect

scared of the hope in my head
its been making me sweat but it turns out

that the world will turn and well grow
well learn how to be
to be incomplete

verse 2

just like before we can rebegin
let your lungs push slow up against my skin
let it all feel just right
see james bay liveget tickets as low as 115you might also likeprechorus
